Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.cap.soft

Interface SoftCapSettings

All Superinterfaces:
CapSettings
public interface SoftCapSettings extends CapSettings
An interface for mutable CAP settings for soft tokens.

      Since:

    • setIaf

      void setIaf(byte iaf)
      Sets the Issuer Authentication Flags.

      The bits listed have the following meaning if set:

      • 8 (most significant) - Either the amount or the amount and currency are used.
      • 7 - PSN is included.
      • 6 - Include only the amount (bit 8 must be set).
      All other bits are reserved and must not be set.
      Parameters:
      iaf - The IAF byte. Default value (byte) 0x80);
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when bit 6 is set and bit 8 is not set (invalid CAP bit flag setting).
      Since:
      4.0

    • setIad

      void setIad(byte[] iad)

      Parameters:

      4.0
